connector.description:
Query data from a MariaDB Database.

In your Pipe file, you must explicitly declare the MariaDB Server driver dependency in spec->integration->dependencies

- "mvn:org.mariadb.jdbc:mariadb-java-client:<version>"

camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.serverName.name: camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.serverName
camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.serverName.description: The server name for the data source. Example: localhost

camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.serverPort.name: camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.serverPort
camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.serverPort.description: The server port for the data source.

camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.username
camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.username.description: The username to access a secured MariaDB Database.

camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.password
camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.password.description: The password to access a secured MariaDB Database.

camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.query.name: camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.query
camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.query.description: The query to execute against the MariaDB Database. Example: INSERT INTO accounts (username,city) VALUES (:#username,:#city)

camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.databaseNam.name: camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.databaseName
camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.databaseNam.description: The name of the MariaDB Database.

camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.consumedQue.name: camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.consumedQuery
camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.consumedQue.description: A query to run on a tuple consumed. Example: DELETE FROM accounts where user_id = :#user_id

camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.delay.name: camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.delay
camel.kamelet.mariadb-source.delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll
